channel.title: Client Help
channel.description:
Well cuz of leechers we all hate are leeching stuff, is there a way to Unleech for e.g. Make your client run of a Client.jar and make the jar file hidden that no1 can access, (and i mean not by just setting the props to hidden) or Hidding your class files like in a cache that can not be leechable.
And how do i make an auto client updater? say if you don't want the ppl to redownload after a new client is released. So i want to make an updater and it should get the New client of a source E.G www.google.com/files/downloadclientnow then unpacks it and writes over your old client or downloads it and puts in a different place so it dont write over.

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @burnt_w_pwnt burnt w pwnt
item.description:
@burnt_w_pwnt wrote:

erm, well say if u were using a silab client. the run.bat Runs and reads from the client.jar file which is the client.
how am i supposed to do that?

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @Cabby Cabby
item.description:
@Cabby wrote:

What do you mean make your run.bat read your jar file?

Like if it’s encrypted?
Or just at all?

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @burnt_w_pwnt burnt w pwnt
item.description:
@burnt_w_pwnt wrote:

yeah it did lot thanks,
but how do i make a my run.bat read my .jar file?

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @Cabby Cabby
item.description:
@Cabby wrote:

Well, to the leeching, couldn’t you try encrypting it to make it harders for others to unpack and try to decrypt?
Not sure if I used the right terms there

Making a client updater seems like it’d be pretty hard…
But then again…
You could have a spot that sets the current version (EX: ‘1.1’ ‘2.4’)…
And maybe a spot on a website that has the newest version?
Then create the client updater that looks for that current version and then connects to that website and checks to see if the current version matches the newest version. If not, maybe have a dialog box that pops up and tells them where to dl the newest version.
Also, in the runclient.bat thing, have it run the client updater.
if they have the newest version then you could have the client updater run your JAR file.

Now this is just off the top of my head, not sure what’s really possible.
Hope I helped

Read full topic

item.description:

Well cuz of leechers we all hate are leeching stuff, is there a way to Unleech for e.g. Make your client run of a Client.jar and make the jar file hidden that no1 can access, (and i mean not by just setting the props to hidden) or Hidding your class files like in a cache that can not be leechable.

then unpacks it and writes over your old client or downloads it and puts in a different place so it dont write over.
